cv.name: Maria Varagilal
cv.title: Digital Product Designer
cv.summary: Digital Product Designer & Frontend Developer with 10+ years of experience delivering digital products from concept to production. Skilled in design systems, UX strategy, and frontend implementation using JavaScript, React, Redux, HTML, and CSS. Passionate about crafting user experiences that are as performant as they are intuitive.

description: Defined product experience, interface, and brand strategy.
Architected product flows and content organization to optimize usability.
Implemented designs into code with JavaScript, Redux, Gatsby, HTML, and CSS.
Built responsive, accessible UIs aligned with design systems.
Partnered with engineers to integrate APIs and deliver scalable features.
Drove continuous product improvement across design and frontend.
Operated in a fast-paced, product-driven environment, balancing design leadership and hands-on coding in a lean team setting.
Development of projects internally and externally.
Design and development of graphic concepts, proposals and projects for mobile and web app.
Social Media campaigns, images and apps.
Development of projects internally and externally. The tasks include developing graphic concepts, designing brochures, guides, roadmaps, and digital and paper infographics.
Development of proposals and projects for mobile and web app.
Design and development of editorial pages for magazines TV GUIA and FLASH

about.quote: Do it with passion, or not at all
about.description1: Energetic by nature and licensed in Design, it's during the undergraduate degree that the passion for the digital arrived. An authentic Workaholic & Perfectionist, nothing is perfect and everything has room for improvement.
about.description2: Leveling up — from pixels to production — bridging design and code with JavaScript, modern frameworks, Redux, and clean UI development to turn ideas into full experiences that are thought through, built out, and ready to perform.
